name: Bonsaispora "Purple Dream"
description: A twitter-like purple-colored theme for the social network Diaspora. If you like this and want to give something back, consider flattring: http://flattr.com/thing/819188/Bonsaispora-Purple-Dream Thanks a bunch! :) Oh and my Website/Blog is here: http://bonsaiheld.org And my DiasporaID: http://dia.so/bonsaiheld
additional_info: Note: Diaspora changed its CSS very often in 2015, so i really don't feel like continuing to develope the theme. It still works though, mostly. __________________________________________________ Features: * NEW: Replaced all images with base64-code, so no need to host them anymore * Background image & colorful links * Rounded boxes and avatars with smooth transparent borders * Icons for like-, reshare- and comment links ---> Icons are transparent to improve flow of reading till cursor is over them * Nice fading in / out effects on all links * Fixes some CSS from the Master branch (e.g. larger font size of the reshare link) ... and more.
